segments.text: Espresso is made with a machine that forces steam and boiling water through finely ground coffee . It's strong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK , this is good . Keep talking . What about cappuccino and all those other drinks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cappuccino is one-third espresso and two-thirds a mixture of steamed milk and froth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want something manly , stick with the espresso .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Hugh . I owe you one .
segments.speaker: S2
